rukus.text: 26|123|Ado (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|124|Kare-ra no doho no fudo ga kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokose. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|125|Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|126|Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|127|Mata watashi wa, kono koto de anata gata ni hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|128|Anata gata wa kochi to iu kochi ni itazura ni ishibumi o tateru nodesu ka.
26|129|Mata anata gata wa (eien ni) sumou to shite, kengona koro o tateru nodesu ka.
26|130|Anata gata wa boryoku o fuu toki, bogyaku-sha no yo ni furumau nodesu ka.
26|131|Arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|132|Anata gata ga shiru hodo no mono o, sadzuke rareru-kata o osore nasai.
26|133|Kare wa kazukazu no kachiku to shison o, anata gata ni sadzuke rare,
26|134|mata kaju-en ya izumi o mo sadzuke rareta.
26|135|Watashi wa anata gata ni kuwae rareru idaina hi no chobatsu o hontoni osoreru.'
26|136|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga sekkyo shite mo sekkyo shinakute mo, watashi-tachi ni totte wa onaji kotodesu.
26|137|Hontoni kore wa, mukashi no yarikata ni sotonarimasen.
26|139|Kare-ra wa, kare o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Sokode ware wa kare-ra o horoboshita. Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai.
26|140|Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru.
